system.powerDescription:
You can project a tension force of incredible strength over any edge, as obvious as a blade and as subtle as a fingernail, and use it as a cutting implement. Roll PSYCHE to cut an object or opponent up to {<CAT> size 0} with a clean and decisive blow, only spending a psyche burst on success. 
        
• Gain +1D if you are striking to protect another person
• Gain +1D against immobile objects or opponents
